head.supplied: ¶ Since the decoration (without diploma etc.) according to the file has been sent back, His Highness has ordered that according to the present circumstances it be sent now direct to Professor Mueller...

div.p: Signatur: 4630, Grossherzogliches Kabinett III, Mecklenburgisches Landeshaptarchiv Schwerin.

Da die Decoration (ohne Diplom etc) laut act, zurückgesandt ist, so haben Serenus befohlen, dass vorliegenden Umständen nach dieselbe jetzt direct an den Professor Mueller nach Melbourne übersandt werde.

[…]
An unknown amount of text missing.

1. diese Allerhöchste Bestimmung ist dem Cabinetsrath Flügge vorzuzeigen über Zustellung des beifolgenden ausgefüllten Schemas, um ein entsprechendes Schreiben in meinem Namen an den Professor Müller vorzulegen, welchem die Insignien des Ritters beizufügen sind.
2. Wegen Uebersendung dieses Schreibens nach Melbourne ist demnächst aus dem Ministerium d. a. A. ein Rescript an den Generalconsul Störzel in Hamburg zu erlassen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Since the decoration (without diploma etc.) according to the file has been sent back, His Highness has ordered that according to the present circumstances it be sent now direct to Professor Mueller to Melbourne.
M had been created a Knight of the Order of the Wendish Crown; see Friedrich Franz II, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg, to M, 9 November 1865, and J. von Oertzen to M, 9 November 1865 (in this edition as 65-11-09a).

[…]
An unknown amount of text missing.

1. This Royal determination is to be shown to Cabinet Councillor Flügge about delivery of the enclosed filled-in draft, with which are enclosed the insignia of the order, so as to submit an appropriate letter in my name to Professor Müller.
J. von Oertzen to M, 25 April 1866.
2. A order to the General consul Störzel in Hamburg is to be issued soon from the Ministry of External Affairs about the dispatch of this letter to Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
